title: Auto dispatches scale new peak as dealers stock up post year-end sales
description: Sales of two-wheelers rose 26% from a year earlier to 1,495,183 units last month. Three-wheeler dispatches went up by 9.5% to 53,537 units. "Passenger vehicles sales have remained resilient led by positive consumer sentiments, while the two-wheeler segment witnessed good growth in January as well, as the rural market continues to recover," SIAM president Vinod Aggarwal said.
